name: Pengy's Journey 2 Demo
description:
BACKGROUND

So many people asked for a sequel to Pengy's Journey that I decided to work on a better game. I wanted to show how much I improved as an artist and a game dev by making a new game and releasing demos along the way. Unfortunately, I got overwhelmed with the development process and school became more important to me so I stopped working on it.

The enemies and art are much improved even though I made this in 2008. The sounds and music aren't by me but everything else is original to the best of my knowledge.

Try to enjoy it!
